description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Print Spooler elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21433):

1. Download and install the latest security updates via Windows Update or manually from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure that you have installed the appropriate KB articles depending on your Windows build.

**Details**:
The following KB articles address this vulnerability:
- KB5035855: Windows 10 for x64-based and 32-bit Systems.
- KB5035856: Windows Server 2022. 
- KB5035853: Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based and ARM64-based Systems.
- Further updates can be found at the Microsoft Update Catalog: [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845), [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858), [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853), [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is backed up before applying patches.
- Confirm that your version of Windows is compatible with these updates.
